name: Cold Storage
description:
A warehouse at the North Pole needs your help! Control the flow of temperature within each level, and use it to activate devices and solve the puzzle. The doors are locked, but Temperature is key!

Controls: Mouse

Thanks for trying out this first version of Cold Storage! If you could give me some feedback in the comment section, it would be very helpful.

Specifically:

1) How easy/difficult were the puzzles?

2) Were there any bugs or glitches ?

3) Was the logic of the puzzles or the instructions unclear at any point? 

Edit 4) What did you think of the art/visuals?

Thanks again in advance :)
